attributes.action: Independent Scotland to bear any costs of UK politicians losing their employment as MPs.
attributes.additional_details: There are 40 or so elected dishonourables who will have nobody to represent if Scotland goes independent in 2015.  This is NOT the fault of English, Welsh nor Northern Irish taxpayers so the loss of employment compensation to be paid to those 40 or so people MUST NOT be paid by English, Welsh nor Northern Irish taxpayers.
